projectGridLines.title: Gandhisagar Water Treatment Project
projectGridLines.description:
Description: Installing the water treatment plant in Gandhisagar from which the

water would be directed to 290 tanks located in rural areas.

Skill sets: MATLAB , SQL

Traits expectation: Basic chemical engineering principles , Communication and

Interpersonal Skills

Expected learning: On site exposure with practical learning

Specific courses required for project execution: Process dynamics and control,

Separation Process , Supply Chain Management , Environmental Pollution Control
